:process.log.description: Pseudo-CLI wrapper for session-scoped process log workflows (init, add, export).
notes: Acts as a difference-encoded prompt wrapper so LLM agents can call the governed pipelines without regex conflicts.
Optional fields (topic, details, citations) default through storage when omitted; event and summary remain required.
